mdai filter enable
------------------

enable a telemetry filter

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


enable a telemetry filter

::

  mdai filter enable

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::

    enable --name filter-1

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help          help for enable
  -n, --name string   name of the filter

      --kubecontext string   Kubernetes context to use
